name: An RPG Where You Save The Town And Maybe Even The World
name_original: An RPG Where You Save The Town And Maybe Even The World
description:
AN RPG WHERE YOU SAVE THE TOWN AND MAYBE EVEN THE WORLD (ANRPG for short) is a tiny rpg made in WOLF RPG Editor for a private game jam between friends. ANRPG was made in 2 weeks, with a week-ish prior for planning. this is also the first time in a very long time that i've managed to finish a project!

in ANRPG you take control of a party of adventurers who take on a seemingly simple task for some extra cash. however, just how deep does this task go? i'm sure you can figure that out from the title...

playtime is 15~30 minutes, but could take longer depending on if you get stuck or decide to grind lol

also sorry if some of the cursor effects are hard to read, you'll probably know what i mean when you play - i could fix this but it would be extremely tedious and you wouldnt do that to lil ol me, would you?

  • grinding isnt necessary but might help!! enemies in the forest respawn after leaving the map, though rumor has it that theres something lurking around the warren mansion...
  • omelia's "dance" skill requires no SP to use, making it easy to heal up after battles without having to head back to town.
  • if you get stuck, try talking to everyone! i will say there was a slight design oversight on my part at one point - just remember you can't teleport back to the warren mansion once you teleport away! you'll have to go all the way back through the forest!
  • character, art, design, game credits to rigby vitulina (thats me!)
    twitter // tumblr
  • music, sound effects credits to PANICPUMPKIN
    website // twitter
  • color palette (pear36) credits to PineappleOnPizza on lospec
    lospec // twitter

feel free to post bug reports in the comments here on itch.io - i may or may not get to fixing them, but at least then other people will know about it!
